abstract: The former national security adviser said this month that he would comply with a Senate subpoena if he received one.
lead_paragraph: The Senate on Wednesday rejected a Democratic effort to subpoena John R. Bolton, the former national security adviser, for testimony in President Trumpâ€™s impeachment trial. The vote fell along party lines,  with the Republican majority prevailing.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
